# Appendix A: Glossary of people {.unnumbered}

This appendix contains links to more information about people Sam meets and/or describes in his memoirs.
People are listed below in alphabetical order.
_Lekiskon_ refers to the entries in the encyclopedia [_Leksikon fun Yiddishn Teater_](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Leksikon_fun_yidishn_teater), many of which have been [translated](https://www.museumoffamilyhistory.com/yt/lex-biography.htm).
